sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Box, Grid, Container, Typography, Card, CardMedia, Link, } from "@mui/material"; import EmojiTypography from "../EmojiTypography/EmojiTypography.js"; import FacebookOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/FacebookOutlined"; import IconTypography from "../EmojiTypography/IconTypography.js"; function Home() { return ( {/* Heading/Introduction */} {/* Image of Me */} {/* Bio */} {/* Greeting */} Justin Zhao {/* Facts */} {/* Bio */} majoring in finance {"&"} c.s. calls southern california home thinks photography is fun {/* Heading/Introduction */} {/* Find Me */} {/* Socials */} } /> } /> ); } export default Home;
